Posts.Content: Feb 3, 2013 10:32AM Lexie_Ann wrote: I think it depends on what type, stage and what you and your doctor decide. Do not beat yourself up about it!  My doctor's suggested a mastectomy for me since my cancer is a stage 3. Again this is just one study and I am sure there will be another one that says the opposite
Posts.Title: Mastectomy carries lower overall survival Afraid Momine
